projects.title: Sales Key Insights Using Power BI
projects.description: My¬†case study is based on a computer hardware company that is addressing issues in an evolving sector.   The sales director decides to invest in a data analysis project and wants to construct a Power BI dashboard that would provide him with real-time sales insights.
